definition: at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning

sentences.english: Since november ordinarily of it early stoped action.
sentences.chinese: 既然是十一月，他们早就该停止活动了。

sentences.english: Without the Han China could never have held together.
sentences.chinese: 没有了汉民族中国早就分崩离析了。

sentences.english: Stone said his work skyshatter organization would have decorated.
sentences.chinese: 石破天说他的工作组织上早就布置好了。

sentences.english: Well, I guess I should've known. He just kept making me watch Moulin Rouge.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，我早就该猜到了他总是强迫我看《红磨坊》。

sentences.english: Husband thinks pisciculture early, took aquarium place in the sitting room then.
sentences.chinese: 老公早就想养鱼，于是在客厅留了鱼缸位置。

sentences.english: If I had that much money, I'd buy another mule.
sentences.chinese: 要是我有那么多钱，我早就另买一头骡子了。

sentences.english: A trip to Dubai at the end of March has long been in Allen's planning for Fairy King Prawn.
sentences.chinese: 爱伦早就计划让靓虾王在三月尾远征杜拜。

sentences.english: He realized early that the best strategy was to harass the British.
sentences.chinese: 他很早就认识到，最好的战略就是骚扰英国人。

sentences.english: If I had enough money, I would have bought that car.
sentences.chinese: 如果我有足够的钱，我早就买下那辆车了。

sentences.english: A rare example of a Feeorin, Nym was orphaned at an early age.
sentences.chinese: 作为罕见的菲奥林人，尼姆很早就成了孤儿。

sentences.english: That old mine was worked out long ago.
Military observers say China's military has long been at that game.
sentences.chinese: 军事观察家们讲其实中国军队老早就这么干了。

sentences.english: The pear trees are blossoming out early this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年梨树很早就在开花了。

sentences.english: Hurry up, dear, the children are already in the car raring to go.
sentences.chinese: 亲爱的，快些，孩子们已坐在车里，早就急不可耐了。

sentences.english: You're leaving so early for your office?
Dolly died very young, though she had seemed healthy.
sentences.chinese: “多莉”尽管看起来很健康，但是她很早就死了。
